aboutText:
About PHOTO CREATIVE PHOTO CREATIVE, is about more than just photography, at the very least, we are about creating art, through photography. Our studio is a professional photography studio and gallery located in Skopje, GTC. Our studio encompasses no less than 9 different photography genres, each focusing on a specific look, and each with it's own style. If you are ready to learn more about our photography and artwork, I would encourage you to read our testimonials, and invite you to explore our website, or better still, come into the studio for a no obligation studio consult, and find out what it's really all about. Open Monday through Saturday, by appointment.
PHOTO CREATIVE Kej 13 Noemvri 5/10 1000,Skopje Aleksandar Slavkovikj- Studio Manager Email slavkovik@yahoo.com Call Today +389 77 705 834
